mst06.name: msg_twn_sonic
mst06.message: Will you accept the request?
Yes
No

My name is Alberto Robert, and I've been making
shoes in this town for a very long time.
I'm making the ultimate shoes now. These shoes use the power of Soleanna's
mysterious stones to change... 
I'm calling them Custom Shoes! But, there is no one that 
can test the full potential of these shoes! Is there anyone who can test the design of 
these shoes? You will be able to do that?
Really?
Oh, no... \nIf no one can use them to their full potential,\nthere's not much use.

Oh, no! Dr. Eggman's mechs, the ones that
stole away Princess Elise, are invading
the town to look for something! Sonic!
Can you help us?
Help!\nMy precious Pele is over there... \fHelp Pele!\nPlease!
Fine! I can save him by myself!

Hey Sonic!
Fight us! We're the Soleanna Boys!
We're here to protect Soleanna. There's six of us. When we're older, we're
going to join the Soleannan royal guards,
and defend this country! Everyone says you'll save Princess Elise, but
we don't believe that. Let's see if you can
defeat us, first! How about it? Are you going to show us what
you've got?
See?\nYou're not capable of saving the Princess!

Hey!
Are you good at soccer? Really?
Then can you take this ball to my brother?
He's going to a soccer match. There's no time!
Please!?
Okay, I understand.\nI'll take it to him myself!

Strong people, come for the famous Soleanna 
Barrel Smash! Simple rules!
Roll the ball and smash 
Soleanna's barrels!
 Win a prize when you
smash a lot! Hey, you want to try it?
Oh, it's you again.\nDid you come to try again?
You're no fun.

Oh no!
I'm Gabbani, the chairman
of the Soleanna Tourism Association. The fountain statue, the landmark of Soleanna,
is about to be destoyed by the mysterious
robots that took Princess Elise. If the robots are stopped before the statue
is destroyed, it can still be repaired, but
no one will help me! Please, please,
save the fountain!
I see... \nWell, that's it for the Soleanna Tourism\nAssociation, then...

Haha! Most excellent!
I'm Berluni.
I'm a jeweler in Soleanna. I have assets of 10 billion Rings... 
making me the richest man in Soleanna. Hey, let's play a little game.
I will hide 100 Rings all over Soleanna. If you can find them all, you can have them!
How about it? Do you want to try it? (Hee-hee, there's only 99 Rings.
I have one hidden in my pocket...)
No?\nYou don't want to do it even if\nyou get a lot of cash?

Help!
A person in that blue car stole
a product from my shop and ran away... It's really important...
You're fast, right?
Will you catch the thief?
What? It would only have taken a minute!

Did you call me?
Ah, you want to know who I am, do you? I saved Princess Elise and I fight bad guys. 
I'm the superhero, Sonic Man! (Man, I'm cool!) Why are you dressed like me?
Oh, I get it!
You look up to me, don't you? Haha!
I will give you my autograph! You don't want it?
You're the real Sonic?
Sure, kid, sure. Just for you,
I'll prove to you that I'm the real thing!
Let's race!
Sonic!\nI've been training to become\nmore like you!\fWill you race me again? Please?
Heh, you're intimidated.\nWell, it can't be helped, I suppose.
Yes, I understand.\nYou're busy, aren't you...

I'm Aristo.
Named after Aristotle, I'm
a young scientist. I've been challenging a lot of people to
intellectual battles, but 
no one can solve my problems. Do you want to challenge me?

Oh, no!
The discs with the passwords
were taken by robots! There's an important Silver medal in here,
but I don't know the password.
What should I do? Sonic! Please, defeat the enemy
and get the discs back!
Oh, I see... \nThis Silver medal was very important...

Welcome! I'm Salvatore, the manager of
Gelato Happy. Well, I'm the only one working
here, but I still am the manager. My business is doing great
recently. I'm so busy. I can't handle all of the orders myself, so
I need to hire some part-time help. I'll pay you according to the 
number of orders delivered.
I'll pay more for long-distance deliveries, too! So how about it?
Do you want to work for me?
Oh, you're the one who worked for me before!\nI haven't found anyone else to help out yet.\fDo you want to work for me again?
Okay, that's too bad.\nI'll find someone else.

I'm the hotel manager, Ken Williams. 
We're putting on a Festival of Rings to mark
the 15th anniversary of our hotel. The game for the festival is easy. 
You keep the Rings you 
collect within the time limit. There are no entry fees.
We do this out of gratitude
to the people of Soleanna. Would you like to enter?
Thank you for participating in the game the\nother day. The Festival of Rings is still\nunderway.\fDo you want to try again?
Oh well, that's too bad.
Hey, do you want to challenge me to a quiz?\nI'll give you a secret letter if you can get\nall the answers!\fDo you want to try it?
Aww... you're a party pooper.

We are Solsaliente, the best circus troupe
in Soleanna!
Solsaliente gives hope to people. But, one of our members got
into an accident while practicing.
We may have to close the show. If there is someone who can 
do the acrobatic Rings,
we wouldn't have to cancel it... Acrobatic Rings is when you 
go through a lot of Rings fast.
It takes athletic ability to do it! I wonder if we can find anyone to do it...
It's okay, thanks anyway.\nI know it's a lot to ask.

Thief! Thief!
Catch the thief! My precious apples were stolen!
There were three sneaky thieves!
Please catch them!
What!?\nI thought you were a hero...

Have you seen a bronze medal around here?
I lost them here!
Someone will take them if I don't find them soon! The medals were my grandpa's.
He got them from King Soleanna 
when he was a soldier. Please!
Will you help me find the bronze medals?
Okay, sorry to bother you.

This is the royal training grounds
for Soleanna's guards. What kind of training is it?
It's a training to quickly handle targets. The point is to attack targets quickly! We try to
break as many targets as possible within a
limited time. To become a Soleannan guard, you need to
break at least 15 targets. It's not easy to do
if you haven't had any training. Do you want to try it?
This is the royal training grounds\nfor Soleanna's guards... Oh, it's you again.\fYou like training, huh?\nDo you want to try again?
Yeah.\nIt's hard for commoners like you.

Ta-la-la...
No... this song won't do.
It needs to be more upbeat. If only there were something swift and
strong and gripping that I could use as
inspiration...  I need some swift action
in there... something new. Like moving through 30 Rings at once...
I see... \nI need to find some inspiration...
Oh no, Sonic!\nThere's a bomb in the station.\nBut, the phone's dead...\fPlease go in the station and defuse the bomb!

Yo!
Are you looking for the key, too? What? You don't know about the key?
During festivals, the Principality of Soleanna 
gives a prize to the one who finds the key. There's only one key. Hints are posted on
boards all over the place, so you'll have look at
them in various places. If you find the key from the hints,
you'll get a prize!
Do you want to participate?
Okay, well, that's too bad.

Once upon a time, there were
three musketeers that saved
Soleanna. According to the legend, they hid treasure
somewhere, but there were conditions that
you had to fulfill to get the treasure. Running speed, rock-crushing
strength, and flying speed are the things
you had to show. But, it's all a legend, so you can't find three
people who take it seriously enough to try it. Huh? You want to try it?
They say that if you go to the clock tower with
the right people, you can hear voices...  You really want to do it?
Yeah,\nthose legends aren't real, anyway.

Name That Song!
Hi, I'm Scott from Soleanna TV. I'll be hosting a Name That Song
tournament in Soleanna today! Hey you, are you into music?
Do you want to try Name That Song?
Oh well, too bad.

Hey, did you know?
The legend of Soleanna's Ring Race! Long time ago there was a guy called Mels.
He went through all the Rings in this Castle
Town in 5 minutes! Incredible speed, don’t you think?
What? You think you are fast, too?
Why don’t you try it?
You're not going to do it?\nToo bad...

Oh no. I've hidden my key
inside one of the barrels, but I
forgot which one it was. The Castle Town is huge, so I 
can't look inside every barrel.
I wish someone would help me...
Yeah, I guess it's hard to find one key\nin this whole town...

H... help!
Eggman's mechs ran off with my company's
disk! That disk has all my company's top secret
classified data on it! Sonic, please!
Get my disk back from them, hurry!
Hey, shouldn't you be busy doing something?\nWhat gives?\nYou call yourself a hero?!
P, please help me! Eggman's mechs\nsuddenly attacked me.\fI am terribly sorry, but you seem very strong.\nCan you please escort me to the Castle Town?
Oh…\nOkay…
What? It would only have taken a minute!
Robert
Galienna
Pinto
Pucci
Porta
Senni
Ares
Roberto
Domenico
Sandro
Rocco
Palermo
Alessio
Pietro
Gabbani
Berruni
Guido
Giorgio
Fabio
Alessio
Gina
Sonicman
Aristo
Lauren
Salvatore
Ken Williams
Monica
Enzo
Thief
Dino
Soleanna Guard
Verdi
Station Staff
Station Staff
Julio
Soleanna
Sophia
Oracle
Oracle
Oracle
Rossi
Antonio
Ivan
Lippi
Okay, that's too bad.\nI'll find someone else.
Sandro
If you're near some Rings and you press\nthe $ button, you can do a Light Dash!
I saw a fox with two tails over by the plaza.\nIt seemed like he was looking for someone...
Are you going after the princess?\nPlease, help her!\fPromise me!\nSonic! Tails!
I was helping with the reconstruction,\nand boy, am I tired. I just finished.\fThere was someone called Tails who was helping,\nbut it seemed like he was looking for someone...
That Tails sure is a nice kid.\fHe was helping with the work the whole time.

Are you going after Dr. Eggman?
You should just forget about it. Not even Soleannan soldiers can stand up to
those robots.
Kids like you wouldn't stand a chance.

I'm not supposed to be here, but I snuck out.
Don't tell anyone. Hey, do you know the store in this town?
There's a lot of interesting things, so
I always come to look.
I wonder what's going on at the beach?
(pant, pant)\nI was taking a walk by the beach... \fAnd suddenly all these mechs appeared... \nI barely got here alive.
It seems that there's danger over by the beach.\nAll I hear is rumors though.\nWho knows what's really going on?
The entrance to the beach is right there.\nCan you see it?\fThere's a "mirror" beyond the\nline of Rings.\fThat "mirror" is linked to the beach.
Soleanna has always been a peaceful country.\nI can't believe something like this would happen\novernight...

Do you know about this tower?
There is a huge bell on the top. The fasteners are rusted, so they haven't rung
in ages, but they were a symbol of peace in
Soleanna...
I'm sure the soldiers will take care of Eggman!
There were rumors that the "Blue Wind" was\nseen during the festival, but I wonder if they're\ntrue...
We haven't seen anything like that since the\nfestivals started... no, there hasn't been anything\nlike that since there's been a Soleanna.\fWhat were the royal guards doing!?
The ocean is so calm... \nIt's hard to believe that all of that even\nhappened.
There's nothing we can do but pray... \nIf only someone would help us...
Princess, please be safe...

I'm sorry to make you worry... 
(sniff) I heard Eggman was going to the desert,
so I just wanted to keep watch from
a high place.
I'm sorry... \n(sniff)
Is that true?\nI hope he doesn't come back to town.
If only I had a lot of Rings,\nI could buy that...
Have you collected a lot of Rings?\fThey just got a new shipment of stuff at the\nshop. Check it out before they sell out!
Dang, I can't buy the new stuff they have at the\nshop with just my allowance.
Hey, you just bought that, didn't you!?\nOh, wow, that's so cool!
Hey, did you hear?\fThey say the way to the desert was closed off\nbecause Eggman showed up there.
The way to the desert is usually left open,\nbut now there's soldiers blocking it... \fI wonder what happened?
Did you know that you can apply for permission\nto get to the desert? I just heard about it.
I heard some voices from over there, but\ndid something happen?
My daughter... my daughter...
I only looked away for just a second... \nHow did this happen?
Thank you!\nThank you so much!
Thank you very much.
You want to go to the desert?\nNot now, not now.\fA little girl got up on a roof somehow,\nand can't get down... \fWe need to do something...
Can't someone do something?
Be careful, you hear?

This is the way to the desert area.
Dr. Eggman has been seen in the desert, so
we're limiting access. If you need to get through,
you'll need to get permission from Lord Regis.
What should I do?\nLord Regis told me to come here, but\nI can't climb up to that roof.
I think I can see something in that crack...
Wow, that was awesome!\nYou were great!
Hey, that kid's climbed all the way up there.\nWhat's she doing?
Sonic! I was watching you.\nThat was so cool!\fHow come you can jump so high?\nCome on, tell me!
Did you know?\nLord Regis used to be some kind of researcher.\nHe's really smart, you know.
Sonic... \nPlease don't fight...
Are you okay?\nI don't know what happened,\nbut it's not good to fight.
The New City?\nIt's a lively place for sure.
Hey, what's with that white-colored guy?\nHe was something else...\nmaking boxes float and stuff.
The guy you were fighting... \nHe had the most determined look in his eyes\nthat I've ever seen.\fI wonder what he's been through...
You want to know if Eggman's mechs came\nthis way?\fDo you think I'd be this calm if they had?\nWhat's going on?

The warehouse district?
That's not in the Castle Town…
that's over in the New City. The warehouse district is pretty far from here,
but...  You're really fast, so it probably won't take long
to get there.

Hey Sonic, do you remember me?
My name is Francesca. Thank you for saving me when I couldn't get
down from the roof. It seemed like something big happened
over there, but were you okay, Sonic?
Sonic, are you going to the New City?\nBe sure to come back soon!

And, all of a sudden, one of Eggman's mechs
was right in front of me. Where it went?
Sorry, I have no idea.
It was just so sudden...
The warehouse district?\nThat's over in the New City.\fThat gate right there leads to the New City.

This way is closed.
I don't know why, but the captain
said not to let you through...  There's a captain over there,
so why don't you try asking there?
The captain said that?\nPlease, save the Princess, for me as well.
I'm not sure what to do about these sudden\norders. What did you do?
Well, the captain is a serious guy at heart.\nJust be careful.
Did you talk to the captain?
Please, help us!
Eggman's mechs have appeared in the New City...\nThis is terrible! I need to let everyone know\nright away.
I wonder what's happening in the New City?\nThe suspense is killing me!
This is just a rumor, but I heard that this building\nholds a very important secret... \fI tried to look inside, but no matter how much\nI pulled or pushed, I couldn't get the door open.

The warehouse district? Hmm... 
You need to go all the way to the other side
of town...  This is your first time to the New City?
If that's the case, it's probably better if you just
follow this big street. It might take a little longer, but you'll be able
to find it easier.
White Acropolis?\nHmm... No, never heard of it...
I keep hearing this really creepy sound coming\nfrom the warehouses...
What? Eggman's mechs were hiding there?\fThis city area's becoming pretty dangerous... \fMaybe I'll just skip work, and go home...
The White Acropolis?\nSorry, I don't know it... \fOh, but there was a kid I passed on the way\nhere yelling about something or the other.\fMaybe he knows something.
We've decided to patrol the town to make sure\neveryone's safe.

Wait, Sonic!
It's dangerous! Eggman's mechs are over there.
It seems like they haven't noticed us yet, but...  I wonder what they're doing?
I'm scared...
Shh! Keep it down!\nI'm keeping watch on that sewer pipe to make\nsure no enemies are hiding there!
I tried to take a look in the sewer pipe,\nbut one of Eggman's mechs showed up\nall of a sudden!\fDo something, Sonic!
I can hear the wind coming through this hole.\nI wonder what it's connected to?
Oh, is something the matter?\fIf you need help, try going to the shop.

I just got a call from a friend, and he says that
he just saw Eggman inside the station! The station?
Just go straight along this street,
and you'll see it.

Listen, I just got the biggest lead on a story!
I'm so happy! Huh? You want to know what it is?
Oh, okay. I was inside the station, and I saw a strange
train go by. I've never seen a train like that before.
I'll bet it has something to do with Eggman! Don't tell anyone else about this!

Hey, did you hear?
A friend of mine is a reporter, and sometimes I
hear things on the down-low...  I heard that Eggman got on a train, and
went somewhere. Don't tell anyone that I told you that!
The station has been closed off for security\nreasons.
The station is currently closed.
Have you ever met Lord Regis from the castle\ntown? He used to do a lot of research, and even\ngot some kind of award a long time ago.\fI wonder what he's like?
This is supposed to be a ventilation shaft\nthat connects to the station. I wonder if\nthere's some way to open it, and get inside.

Did you know?
There's a legend in Soleanna about an eagle. A long time ago, the city of Soleanna was hit by
a huge fire. A big eagle appeared, and saved the
whole city...  It's a crazy old fairy tale.
Some of the old folks still believe it, though.
What?\nThe battleship is about to explode?\fThat's terrible!\nI've got to let Mom and Dad know!
What are you so worked up about?\nWhat!? The battleship is about to explode!?\nThat's terrible!\fYeah, right. You can't trick me that easily.
Sigh... \nWhen will we be able to go home again?
You were talking to Anna earlier, right?\nIs there anything new going on?
I wonder what this building is.\nI've lived here in Soleanna for a long time,\nbut no one knows what this building is.\fI wonder what's inside...
I heard Princess Elise went to find Eggman\nall by herself.\fI'm sure she was trying to protect us from harm.\nShe's so kind, and so noble...
I heard Princess Elise has been kidnapped again.\nI don't know what to believe any more...
Poor Princess Elise... \fIf only she'd been born to a normal family,\nshe wouldn't have to go through all of this...

The way to the old castle of Soleanna? Hmm... 
It has always been a holy place, and only
those of the royal family could enter. People associated with the royal family
may know something helpful.

The way to the old castle of Soleanna?
It's been a while since anyone has asked
me that. The old castle is a holy place, and only those
of the royal family may enter. The entrance is blocked by a special seal, which
tests anyone who tries to enter. If you want to enter the old castle, you must
overcome three trials. These are trials of life and death...  Are you sure you want to face them?
Very well, I will take you to the trials.
I see. It can't be helped...
This is where the trials are held.\fWhen all three of the stone pillars around you\nare alight, the path to the old castle shall open.
You have successfully cleared the "Trial of\nKnowledge." But there are still two trials to go...
You have cleared the "Trial of Courage"\nas well... \fBut the last trial may prove to be\nthe most difficult.
You have cleared even the final trial... \fGrab onto that eagle,\nand proceed to the old castle.\fPlease save the Princess,\nsmall hero...
The first trial is the "Trial of Knowledge."\nThis will test your mind... \fAre you ready?\nBegin!
You have done well.\nProceed to the second trial.
Only the final trial remains.\nBe ready for anything!
You have completed all of the trials.\nPlease, save the Princess...
First, complete the first trial.
The second trial is the "Trial of Courage."\nThis will test the strength of your heart.\fAre you ready?\nLet us begin the second trial.
You have done well.\nNow, proceed to the final trial.
You have completed all of the trials.\nNow, hurry to the old castle.
First, complete the first trial.
First, complete the second trial.

The final trial is the "Trial of Love."
This may be the most difficult trial
for you. Are you ready?
Let us begin the final trial.
You have done well.\nNow, let that eagle carry you.
Eggman came again... \nIt was so scary...
Princess Elise went to find Eggman all by herself.\fI'm sure she did it to keep the rest of us\nfrom harm... She's so kind, and so noble...
The wind of Soleanna will blow again.\nI hope we'll see peace soon...
I heard Princess Elise was kidnapped again.\nI don't know what to believe any more...
Poor Princess Elise... \fIf only she'd been born to a normal family,\nshe wouldn't have to go through any of this...

You're looking for Soleannan researchers?
Well, perhaps I can help you there. I myself used to work at the Soleannan
laboratory. The way into the secret base?
I could tell you, I suppose, but I don't know how
useful it would be...  To enter the secret base,
you need to ring the three bells of Soleanna. But... 
It may no longer be possible. The clasps are rusted, and the bells no longer
ring for as long as they used to. With a strong impact, they may still ring
long enough...
The bells rang perfectly.\nThe door to the laboratory should now be open.
It's been a really long time since there was\nresearch going in in Soleanna, so I can't really\nhelp. Sorry...
The bells rang all of a sudden,\nbut what was that about?
Soleannan researchers?\fI was still a kid when the laboratory\nwas open, so I don't really know... \fThe incident happened ten years ago, so\nyou're going to need to ask some older people.
It's been a while since I heard the bells.\nIt reminds me of when I was a kid...
Heh, heh. Ah, yes, I remember.\fOne of my friends was a researcher, too.\nHe's very different now, though.
Heh, heh.\nSuch nice weather, and the sound of the bells.\nIt's a perfect day for a walk.

You're looking for former researchers?
My old man used to work at the laboratory,
but he lives pretty far away now...  Any other researchers?
What are you talking about?
Have you forgotten about Lord Regis? He's pretty old now, but he used to be
an elite researcher in his time.
How long has it been since I've heard\nthe bells ring?
Entry is prohibited while\nreconstruction is underway.
You can't get through here\nbecause of the construction.
Please wait until the\nconstruction is completed.
Entry past this point is\nprohibited for now.
Not to sound weird or anything,\nbut did you have something you\nneeded to do here?
Oh, you have a pass from Lord Regis!\nThen there's no problem.\nGo right ahead.
Tails was over in Castle Town.\nHe seemed to be in a panic over something,\nso you might want to catch up with him.
Something's going on over in Castle Town.\nI wonder if it has something to do with\nthat flying battleship?
I saw Tails over that way.
The bishop?\nI didn't see him come this way.
Tails? I think I saw him around the Altar.
The bishop headed over there. You can see\nthe building from the bell tower.

You've saved us! On
behalf of the townsfolk,
let me give you our thanks. You want to go to the desert?
Just let the soldiers know
that you're heading out. They say Eggman headed out
that way, so please be
careful.
Oh, Lord Regis told me\nabout you. Please, go\nright on ahead.
I saw the bishop over there.
The bishop? I think I saw\nhim down by the bell tower.
The bishop is down below\nthe bell.

You're looking for the
Soleanna laboratory? I'm
not actually sure, but... "When the 3 sounds chime,
the royal family's secret
door will open," they say. I wonder if they're talking
about the bells around town.

You rang all the bells!
Now you can get to the lab
from the temple. The temple? It's the round
building surrounded by the
arched pillars.

You're looking for the
Soleanna laboratory? I'm
not actually sure, but... "When the 3 sounds chime,
the royal family's secret
door will open," they say. I wonder if they're talking
about the bells around town.

You rang all the bells!
Now you can get to the lab
from the temple. The temple? It's the round
building surrounded by the
arched pillars.

One of the bells is atop this
building. The other two are in
high towers. The bells are placed in a
triangle, so they should be
easy to find.

You can get to the laboratory
from this building, but you
have to open the door. Perhaps some former lab workers
could tell you how the door
can be opened.
Hey, you rang the bells!\nNow you can get to the lab\nfrom here.
Have you been to the gate?\nThey've got it closed off.\nI heard the captain did that.

Huh? You want me to open the
gate so you can get into the
New City plaza? Did somebody tell you that
I'd just go ahead and do
that for you? In that case, I'm sorry
to say I can't actually
help you. I'm just a lieutenant.
Are you looking for the
commander? Well, if you just talk to
every soldier in town, you'll
find him eventually, right?

Dr. Eggman?
I don't have time for that right now.
Please, come back later. A little girl got up on a roof somehow,
and can't get down...
$Ancient castle? But to get there... \nYou need to pass Soleanna's test.\nThe bishop will know more.

$Soleanna's lab is underneath the castle.
But, after the Duke's death, it has been
shut down and sealed away. $If you can find one of the former
researchers, they may be able to guide you.
$This is terrible!\nPrincess Elise went to see Eggman by herself.\nTails, please help her!

I've never seen you before.
Are you a tourist?
Well, welcome to Soleanna! People that you can talk to
have a conversation icon
above their heads, like me. Yellow icons show people who
want to talk to you. Orange icons show people who
have valuable hints. Blue icons show people who
are looking for help. The same colors are also
shown on your radar.
Take a look! If you're lost on where to
go, you might want to check
around for info first!
Welcome to the New City of Soleanna.\fThis city's big, isn't it?\nKeep an eye out for tall buildings and other\nlandmarks so you don't get lost.
Uh... Turn right at the second building, then\nleft at the intersection... No, wait, was it right?\fPlus a bunch of strange kids were running after\nme, yelling something about littering... Sigh...

Do you know about the caves near here?
I wanted to explore them after school,
but my girlfriend doesn't want me to go. I just want some more "me" time, you know?
I wonder if this is what marriage is like?
Even if the world was ending,\nall I want is to be with my boyfriend.\f...I wonder if I'm too clingy?
This city of Soleanna used to be a calm,\npeaceful city, filled with nature.\fLife's more convenient, sure, but it makes\nme long for the good old days...

Sigh...  Oh, I'm sorry.
I'm a freelance journalist, you see...  I wanted to come out to the big city, and
get some big stories, and make it big as
a journalist. But this city's so peaceful!
There was a little earthquake, but
nothing else happens here!

Luppy! Oh, sorry. Don't be scared.
This is a new greeting I came up with. I've combined "lucky" and "happy" into one word!
"Luppy"! Here, why don't you try it, too?
Lu... Come on, don't be shy!

Hey, are you a tourist?
Let me tell you about Soleannan cuisine. First and foremost, you've got to try the
seafood. Soleanna is surrounded by the
sea, and the seafood is to die for. The Soleannan crab, in particular, is world-famous
for its juicy meat and intense flavor! Coming to Soleanna and not eating the crab
is like turning down a date with the Princess!

This is odd... 
I still can't get to my meeting... 
Is this the wrong way? And to top it all off, a bunch of strange kids ran
after me yelling something about jaywalking... 
Sigh...
I'm going shopping with my daughter today!\nI can't even remember the last time we did this.
Come on, Mom!\nI wanted to go out with my friends today, not\ngo shopping with you!
Freeze! Don't move!\fI can't believe I lost it... \nIt doesn't look like it's around here.\fHuh? What's wrong?\nOh, you can go ahead and move now.
What?\nWhat do you want from me?
We're the Soleannan patrol!\fWe're patrolling the city... \nBut there's absolutely nothing going on.\fI wish something would happen.\nSomething not too scary...
We're the Soleannan patrol!\fWe arrested one person for littering, and\none person for jaywalking today!

Hm? You want to know what I'm doing?
It's kind of a long story...  I'm going on an international business trip for the
first time. I need to take a long train ride, but...  I thought the trip was today, but this ticket
is for tomorrow. I can't get on the train, and my boss is probably
wondering where I am... 
What am I supposed to do?
This is the Soleanna City Station.\nIf you see anything suspicious in the station\nor on the trains, please let us know.
The gates are closed temporarily!\nThank you for your cooperation!
This is a warehouse.\nIf you don't have any business here, stay away.

Hi.
I'm a starving artist, as you can see. I've fallen in love with the Soleannan sea.
I've been here for years, just painting
the sea. The sea here is amazing. The colors are entirely
different depending on the day and the time.
I can never get enough of painting it! Oh, sorry. I got a little carried away.
Come by and visit if you have some time.
I'll be around here somewhere.
Welcome.\nPlease let me know when you're ready to order.
This is the station. Look, there's a lot of\npeople walking around the station.
Such nice weather we're having.\nNothing beats a good walk when the weather's\nnice.
That's a "Network Shop."\nYou can use it to shop without going all the way\nto the Castle Town.\fEverything's so convenient these days.
Hey, try getting on this spring.
Hee hee, surprised?\fI put this here, but there's a lot more\nin other places, so look for them!\nYou might find some surprising places.
There's an exclamation point above the heads of\npeople you can talk to in town.\fPeople with important hints have different\ncolors, so keep an eye out for them.
This is the famous clocktower for the New City.\nThis city's large, so if you get lost\nyou can use this as a landmark.
To save, press $ and select save.\fIf you don't do anything, you won't save at all,\nso be careful.
This is the warehouse district.\nThe vast majority of the goods that arrive in\nSoleanna are distributed from here.
This is a nice place, isn't it?\nI like to come here and watch the yachts\nwhen the weather's good.
This is the entrance to the highway.\nThere are a lot of cars beyond here, so\nplease watch out.

I'm the accordion player in this town.
Here, let me play an old Soleannan tune for you. "The Sea is Calling" On the quiet sea, the birds rest... 
The Soleannan sun shines warmly...  Our sea, our ocean, with its great love... 
Bringing us peace and hope...  This town has a long history, so
there are a lot of old songs.
Come by any time if you want to hear more.
If you go straight on here\nthere's a gate leading to the city.
I was taking a walk, and I fell from the cliff.\nNow I can't get back without going all the\nway around. What a pain... Maybe I'll go home.
My Dad thinks he tells the best jokes\nin the world. He's always practicing\nwhen Mom's not looking.

I ordered a pizza the other day, and the
guy asked me, "Do you want that cut into
8 pieces? Or 6?" So I told him! "Hey, I may be fat, but I can't eat 8 pizzas!
6 is enough!"
I've gotten used to living in the city,\nbut it's always nice to get away from\nit all, and relax in the woods.
If you go straight on here\nthere's a gate leading to the city.\fI think it's closed now, though.
If you go up this hill and follow the road,\nthere's a tall tower that looks like a ruin.\nIt looks like there's something at the top of it...
My Dad thinks he tells the best jokes\nin the world. He's always practicing\nwhen Mom's not looking.\fI don't think he's that funny, though...

A friend of mine said the other day,
"I ate too many donuts, and put on all
this weight!" So I told him! "At least you could've left the holes
in the middle!"
Listening to the birds chirping in the woods\nis so relaxing.\nThat's why I always find myself here.

I'm Emanuella.
I go to college in Soleanna.
You can call me Emma. Sometimes I get this feeling like someone's
watching me. I turn around, and no one's there,
but... It's just kind of creepy, you know?

She says she feels like someone's watching her.
It's okay, though, because I'll protect her. I fell madly in love with her the first time
I saw her. But she'd never give me the time
of day...  That's what I always thought.
But watching you, I feel like I can do it, too! I'm going to tell her how I feel about her!
I'm going to tell her that I... uh...
What is Eggman trying to do?\nThe way he's acting, it's hard to believe that\nhe's just after ransom money... \fWhat's going to happen to this country?

I heard the "Blue Wind" blew when the
Princess was kidnapped, but couldn't
save her. Man, that's weak.
I would've karate-chopped Eggman and saved the
Princess, no problem! Huh? Well, I had a stomach ache that day, so
I was at home in bed. Really.

There's no school today.
It's right after all of that happened, so
I guess it can't be helped. I was really looking forward to class today, too.
I'll never forgive that Eggman person!

You're not thinking about fighting Eggman,
are you? You should really think twice about that.
He may look kinda silly, but he's a
genius scientist, right?
Come on, Sis!\nLet's go home!

This sucks.
We came out here on vacation, but
did something happen? A lot of shops are closed, and people are looking
all tense... You look a little tense, too. Did something happen?
It's okay, you can tell me.
Eggman's nothing!\nI'll take him down with my famous\nkarate-chop!\f...That's what my dad said.
The sun of Soleanna shines down equally on\neveryone, young and old.\fOn rainy days, and on windy days... \nEven the day that Eggman arrived.\fWow, I'm a poet!

I spent years saving my money, and finally
bought a condo in the New City.
I was supposed to move in today. But with the big earthquake the other day,
and Eggman's attack yesterday, the whole
place is a mess! I can't move in for a while, but my old place has
already been sold.
What am I supposed to do now?
Lord Regis in the Castle Town was an old\nschool buddy of mine.\fWe used to do a lot of science experiments\ntogether.\fHe's always been such a serious fellow.
Grandpa's always like this...telling stories\nabout his friend Lord Regis.\nThey must've been really good friends.

I'm keeping an eye on the sea.
If he attacks again, I've got to let everyone
know, so they can get away. I don't know what Eggman wants, but
I'm going to protect this town!
The New City is up ahead.\nThe gate may be closed from time to time\nfor security reasons.

It seems that Princess Elise's kidnapping
is causing many people to volunteer
to become soldiers and fight Eggman. But Soleanna has never had a strong military.
We have only minimal weaponry, so more
soldiers won't really help us. There's not much we can do against advanced
weaponry and military power, unfortunately.
We need to think of something, though...
My son left home years ago, saying that\nhe was going to make it big in the city.\fI wonder what he's doing now...

I haven't seen you around before... 
Are you a traveler?
This is the Altar of Flame. This altar has been used in festivals for
generations. But now...
Hey, did you hear?\nWhen Princess Elise was about to be kidnapped,\nthe "Blue Wind" saved her!
Did you hear about the "Blue Wind"?\nIt's gotta be the guardian spirit of Soleanna!

The previous Duke Soleanna was a noble man.
He was very intelligent, even in his younger days. Everyone loved Duke Soleanna. But for something like that to happen... 
No, never mind.
It's just the ramblings of an old man.

The Principality of Soleanna has always been
a neutral country. It has never invaded another
nation. But Eggman's sudden attack... 
What is he trying to do?
Welcome to the New City of Soleanna.\fSoleanna has always been a peaceful city.\nI can't believe that anything like last night\nwould happen. The Princess, kidnapped...

Let's see... Right at the second building, then
right at the intersection... No, was it left?
I keep getting lost here...  Everyone looks so tense, too... 
I wonder if something happened?

I'm going to go save the Princess!
I can't sit here and do nothing! But my girlfriend doesn't want me to go.
She's jealous, or something.
Women can be such a pain...

Who's more important to you, Princess Elise
or me? Would you rather go chasing after her
than be with me? If only I could come right out and say that.
Oh, wait, I just did, didn't I?
Soleanna used to be a calm, peaceful\nplace, filled with nature.\fLife is more convenient, but it's hard for\nan old woman to adapt.

This is it! This is my big story!
It may not be good news, but...  I'm a journalist, and it's my job to report
what happens. My next scoop will be, "The mysterious shadow
that saved the kidnapped Princess!"
I'll be rooting for you!

Luppy! Oh, sorry. Don't be scared.
This is a new greeting I came up with. I've combined "lucky" and "happy" into one word!
"Luppy"! Here, why don't you try it, too?
Lu... Come on, don't be shy!

Hey, are you a tourist?
Let me tell you about Soleannan cuisine. Soleanna is well-known for its seafood, but
you need to try the local junk food,
the frite sandwich! It's fresh vegetables and fish,
deep-fried and put in a bun with
fresh lemon juice. The food here is so good that if you're here for
a week, you'll gain 10 pounds. You better make
sure you don't eat too much!
What's going on here?\nI still can't find my business meeting.\nIs this the wrong street...?
Hee hee, I'm out shopping with my daughter\nagain today.\fShe treats me like I'm old, and insists on\ncarrying my bags.
Geez, Mom!\nI'm just trying to be nice!

Freeze! Don't move! I can't find it! Where is it!?
If it's not here,
the only other place it could be is...  Hey, what's wrong?
Oh, you can go ahead and move now.
Go away.\nJust go away...

We're the Soleannan Patrol! There's been a major incident in the peaceful
town of Soleanna! Our idol, the Princess Elise, has been
kidnapped by the evil scientist Eggman! But this is no time to panic. We must first
gather information! So... Do you have any information?
We're the Soleannan Patrol!\fWe need to arrest Eggman on charges of\nkidnapping Princess Elise, but we don't know\nwhere he is!

Hm? You want to know what I'm doing?
It's kind of a long story, but...  Today is the day of my first international
business trip! I got the dates messed up and
showed up yesterday, but today I'm ready to go! I put the ticket in my wallet so I wouldn't forget
it, but then I forgot my wallet at home. If I go home now I'll miss the train,
and I don't have my wallet, so I can't buy
another ticket. What should I do?
This is the Soleanna City Station.\nIf you see anything suspicious in the station\nor on the trains, please let us know.
This is the gate between the Castle Town and\nthe New City. I'm guarding it to make sure no\nsuspicious people pass through.
This is a warehouse.\nIf you don't have any business here, stay away.

Hi. I'm a starving artist, as you can see.
I sit here every day painting the sea, but
someone just made me an offer...  They offered to pay me a lot of money to
paint a perfect imitation of a famous artist's
painting of the sea. I've heard about an organization that pays
poor artists to make fakes of famous paintings,
then sells them to museums. I like the idea of lots of people seeing my work,
and getting paid, but still... I don't know if this
is such a good idea...
Welcome.\nPlease let me know when you're ready to order.
Coo...
This is the station, but with all of the things\nthat have been going on, it keeps getting shut\ndown. It's terrible, really.
Such nice weather we're having.\nNothing beats a good walk when the weather's\nnice.
The shop gets new products every once in a\nwhile, so it's a good idea to keep checking back.
Apparently you can find places in town where\nyou can grind.\fYou might find some hidden in some surprising\nplaces.

I'm the town's accordion player.
Here's a song for Princess Elise. I hope
she's okay...  "Beautiful Elise" Oh, beautiful Princess Elise... 
Princess Elise, Princess Elise...  Oh, beautiful Princess Elise... 
Beautiful beautiful Princess Elise...  All of my love and all of my dreams
are only for you...  Oh, beautiful Princess Elise... 
Beautiful beautiful Princess Elise...  I've got to come up with a song of celebration
for when she comes back safely.
If you go down here and to the right,\nthere's a gate leading to the city.
If you go up this hill and follow the road,\nthere's a tall tower that looks like a ruin.\nIt looks like there's something at the top of it...
My Dad thinks he tells the best jokes\nin the world. He's always practicing\nwhen Mom's not looking.\fI don't think he's that funny, though...

The other day, a friend of mine says,
"They're saying on the radio that there's
a car going the wrong way on the highway!" So I told him! "That's nothing! Every other car except for ours
is going the wrong way!"
The woods seem different today... \fI wonder if it's just me.\nI hope nothing bad happens...
Sometimes I get this feeling like someone's\nwatching me.\fI turn around, and no one's there,\nbut... It's just kind of creepy, you know?
She says she feels like someone's watching her.\fI'm so glad that I follow her around to protect\nher.\fI've... I've decided.\nI'm going to tell her how I feel about her!
I wonder what Eggman's up to?\nHe's so desperate, he must be\ntrying to do something big... \fI can't even begin to imagine what it might be...

Things are getting kind of dangerous lately,
so a lot of girls are coming up to me and
asking me to protect them. What? You want to meet those girls?
Uh, sure! Maybe some other time.
I'm busy practicing my karate-chop.

School's closed, so we all wanted to go to
the New City to play, but my parents said
it's too dangerous. Sigh... 
I wish someone would hurry up and stop Eggman.

You're doing some pretty risky things,
aren't you?
I worry about you...  When things settle down, why don't you come
by? I'll make a tasty stew for you!
Hm? You want to know what a bunch of\nSoleannan soldiers are doing here?\fWe're certainly not slacking off or anything.\nWe're discussing how best to protect the country.
Simply wishing for something won't make it\nhappen. We need to actively make it happen!\fFreedom for Soleanna!\nPeace and happiness for her citizens!\fSo... How do we make that happen?
Those soldiers have just been sitting there\nand talking all day.\fThey should just do whatever they can,\ninstead of sitting there talking.

When things settle down I'd like to
go to the beach with my girlfriend.
Or maybe a barbeque in the desert! Hmm... No, a barbeque in the woods might be
better. Or skiing! Or snowboarding! But first, I need to find a girlfriend.
So much to do, so little time...
The condo I bought in the New City is ruined.\nI already sold my old house, so I have nowhere\nto live... \fWhat am I supposed to do?

Lord Regis in the Castle Town is an old
school buddy of mine. I heard that he stood up to Eggman, and
got locked away somewhere. He's always
been a brave man.
Grandpa keeps telling anyone who'll listen\nall about his friend Lord Regis. He must be\nreally happy.
Why are you looking so serious?\nIs something wrong? What is it?\fDon't just keep it all bottled up inside.\nYou can always trust me.
The New City is just beyond here. This gate may\nbe closed for security reasons from\ntime to time. Thank you for cooperating!
I'm new here, so if you have questions,\nplease ask the guard on the right!

I heard that there was trouble in Soleanna,
so I came back home. I was worried about
my Mom...  I'm so glad she's okay.
This is a good chance to stay for a while,
and take care of her.

My son, the one that ran away from home... 
He came back! He heard about what was going
on, and he got worried and came back! I'm so happy!
Not everything that happens is bad, is it?
In Soleanna, the sun has always been considered\nto be sacred.\fThe flames used during festivals probably have\nsomething to do with that.
Hey, did you hear?\nThey say the "Blue Wind"\nlooks like a hedgehog.
A hedgehog?\nIsn't that a white one, then? I've been seeing\na white hedgehog around here a lot.

Ever since Duke Soleanna passed away,
Princess Elise has done a wonderful job
protecting and leading her people. That's why everyone loves and respects
her so much. I do hope she comes back soon...
Soleanna used to be known for its natural beauty\nand peacefulness. But now...
Welcome to the New City of Soleanna.\fI wonder why Eggman kidnapped Princess Elise?\nI hope she's okay...

Let's see... Right at the third building, then
left at the intersection... No, was it right?
I keep getting lost here...  Everyone looks so tense, too... 
I wonder if something happened?

I'm going to go save the Princess!
I can't wait any longer! How can I do nothing when a maiden is in
distress!? But my girlfriend won't let
me go... What should I do?
If it's that important to you,\nthen I won't stop you anymore... \fI wish I had enough self-confidence\nto say that to him.

This city isn't a good place for old folks like me.
I keep thinking of the good old days, when there
was plenty of nature here. That was back when Duke Soleanna was just
a child...  He was such a cute child, with an intelligent little
face... 
Oh well, never mind me...

This girl says she got lost, and can't find
her boyfriend. So I'm helping her look for him. My job as a journalist is important too,
but I can't just ignore her...  It's times like this, when we all need to
fight against evil, we really need
to come together in the spirit of cooperation. Whoa. Where did that come from?
Never mind, forget I said anything.
Luppyluppy!\fOh, sorry. Don't be scared.\nThis is a new greeting I came up with.\fI've combined "luppy" and "luppy" into one word!\n"Luppyluppy"!\fIn times like these, it's important to stay upbeat!

Hey, are you a tourist?
Let me tell you about Soleannan cuisine. The sweet, juicy fruits of Soleanna are
world-famous, especially apples! They're crispy, yet bursting with
sweet, flavorful juice! Soleannan apples
are enjoyed worldwide. Apples are used as hidden flavoring in all kinds
of Soleannan cooking, too.
Try one if you get a chance!
What's going on here?\nI still can't find my business meeting.\nIs this the wrong street...?

Hee hee, I'm out shopping with my daughter
again today. We can't agree on who's going to carry
the bags, so we're switching every
50 yards.

Geez, my mom's so stubborn!
I said I'd carry the bags, but she just
won't listen! But I guess I'm just as stubborn... 
I'm her daughter, after all! Ha!

Freeze! Don't move! It's not here... It's not here!
It's not here, either!
I'm going to have to look for it all over again! What's wrong?
Oh, yeah, you can go ahead and move now.
Don't look at me.\nI don't like it when people look at me...
We're the Soleannan Patrol!\fWe need to arm ourselves for the upcoming\nbattle against Eggman!\fI'm a melee fighting kind of guy, so I'm going\nto use the bat my dad got me!
We're the Soleannan Patrol!\fWe must arm ourselves for the upcoming\nbattle against Eggman.\fI'm more of a ranged fighter, so I'm going to use\nthe super water rifle my mom bought me!

Hm? You want to know what I'm doing?
It's a long story, but...  Today was supposed to be the day of my first
international business trip. I've had the worst
luck, but I thought I could finally go today. But they say that something happened,
and the station is closed. The company I was going to meet with
is mad at me, and my boss says I'm fired.
What am I supposed to do now? Well, since I lost my job anyway,
maybe I'll write a book about my experiences. "How To Have the Worst Luck Ever"... 
No one's going to buy that, are they?
This is the Soleanna City Station.\nIf you see anything suspicious in the station\nor on the trains, please let us know.
This is the gate between the Castle Town and\nthe New City. I'm guarding it to make sure no\nsuspicious people pass through.
This is a warehouse.\nIf you don't have any business here, stay away.

Hi. I'm a starving artist, as you can see.
I sit here every day painting the sea, but
someone just made me an offer...  They offered to pay me a lot of money to
paint a perfect imitation of a famous artist's
painting of the sea. I'm still trying to figure out what to do.
Should I make money by painting forgeries? Do I take money, or my pride?
That's the question...
Welcome.\nPlease let me know when you're ready to order.
Coo...
Such nice weather we're having.\nNothing beats a good walk when the weather's\nnice.
If you don't have enough money to buy things\nin stores, try helping out people in town.\fIf you take care of requests for them,\nthey might give you some Rings.
If you go through this warp hole,\nyou'll end up somewhere else.\fIf you use it right, you can get to faraway\nplaces really quickly.
I'm the town's accordion player.\nOnce everything's over, I'll make a song\nabout your adventures.
If you go straight on here\nthere's a gate leading to the city.
I wonder what that tower is\nat the top of the hill?\nIt looks really old...
My Dad thinks he tells the best jokes\nin the world. He's always practicing\nwhen Mom's not looking.\fI don't think he's that funny, though...

A friend of mine says the other day,
"I got bitten by a dog in town, and it was
terrible!" So I told him! "Put a sign on your pants that says,
'No biting!'"
Am I seeing things?\nI thought I saw a huge eagle flying by...
Moldi is such an interesting person!\fWe get along so well.\nI've never met anyone who understands me\nlike he does!

We've decided to start off as friends,
and see where it goes from there! I'm so happy I finally told her how I feel!
Life is awesome!
I love the whole world!

I finally know what Eggman is after!
He must be in love with the Princess! But, hmm...  If it's love he's after,
why didn't he kidnap my wife?
She's so amazingly beautiful...

There's rumors about Eggman's mechs in
the New City. It's time for me to unveil my karate-chop.
I'm on my way, just as soon as I get something
to eat!
Why are you in such a hurry?\nAre you going to go save the Princess?\nCome on, tell me!

You're doing some pretty risky things,
aren't you?
I worry about you...  When things settle down, why don't you come
by? I'll make a tasty stew for you!
Hm? You want to know what a bunch of\nSoleannan soldiers are doing here?\fWe're certainly not slacking off or anything.\nWe're discussing how best to protect the country.
Simply wishing for something won't make it\nhappen. We need to actively make it happen!\fFreedom for Soleanna!\nPeace and happiness for her citizens!\fSo... How do we make that happen?
Those soldiers have just been sitting there\nand talking all day.\fThey should just do whatever they can,\ninstead of sitting there talking.

When things settle down I'd like to
go to the beach with my girlfriend.
Or maybe a barbeque in the desert! Hmm... No, a barbeque in the woods might be
better. Or skiing! Or snowboarding! But first, I need to find a girlfriend.
So much to do, so little time...

The condo I bought in the New City is ruined,
so I can't move in for a while. I'd already moved out of my old place, so
I wasn't sure what to do, but...  I'd been fighting with my dad for the longest
time, but we patched things up, and I'm going
to live with him for a while.
I'm glad to help. Plus I'm glad that we're\nfinally talking again. Ho, ho.
I wonder why Eggman kidnapped Princess Elise?\fCould it be... love?\nNah...
Why are you looking so serious?\nIs something wrong? What is it?\fDon't just keep it all bottled up inside.\nYou can always trust me.
The New City is just beyond here. This gate may\nbe closed for security reasons from\ntime to time. Thank you for cooperating!
I'm new here, so if you have questions,\nplease ask the guard on the right!

I heard that there was trouble in Soleanna,
so I came back home. I was worried about
my Mom...  I'm so glad she's okay.
This is a good chance to stay for a while,
and take care of her.

My son, the one that ran away from home... 
He came back! He heard about what was going
on, and he got worried and came back! I'm so happy!
Not everything that happens is bad, is it?

This the Altar of Flame, also known as the
Altar of Light. I've heard from the bishop that there is
something nearby that is connected to
the dark...  Perhaps it's true that light and darkness
always come in pairs.

Hey, did you hear?
The people over in the royal family
are running around like something happened. Do you think something's happened to
Princess Elise?

It's okay,
I'm sure the guardian of Soleanna will
save her. You know, like the time at the festival,
when the "Blue Wind" saved her.
The incident 10 years ago was so terrible.\nEveryone cried when the Duke passed away.\fEven now, I get misty-eyed when I talk about\nit like this...
Soleanna used to be known for its natural beauty\nand peacefulness. But now...
Welcome to the New City of Soleanna.\fI wonder when Princess Elise will return?\nI hope she's okay...

Let's see... Right at the fifth building, then
straight at the intersection... No, was it right?
Wait, wasn't I just here? Everyone looks so tense, too... 
I wonder if something happened?

I tried to go save the Princess!
But I ran into one of Eggman's mechs,
and it came running after me...  It was really scary! My girlfriend was with me,
but then we lost sight of each other. I have to
find her quickly, or she'll slap me!
I was with my boyfriend, but we got separated\nin all the confusion. I wonder where he went?\fWe promised each other we'd be together\nforever... *sob*

Eggman's mechs are showing up in town now,
too...  I can understand how everyone feels, but
we need to make sure we don't panic. Fear and worry lead to panic.
You should make sure you always stay calm, too.

This girl says she got lost, and can't find
her boyfriend. So I'm helping her look for him. My job as a journalist is important too,
but I can't just ignore her...  It's times like this, when we all need to
fight against evil, we really need
to come together in the spirit of cooperation. Whoa. Where did that come from?
Never mind, forget I said anything.
Luppyluppy!\fOh, sorry. Don't be scared.\nThis is a new greeting I came up with.\fI've combined "luppy" and "luppy" into one word!\n"Luppyluppy"!\fIn times like these, it's important to stay upbeat!

Hey, are you a tourist?
Let me tell you about Soleannan cuisine. The tastiest part of any Soleannan meal
is the dessert! Sorbets made with fresh fruit,
flavorful gelatos... 
There's nothing wrong with loving dessert! I can never get enough dessert!
That's why I keep gaining weight... 
It's terrible...
What's going on here?\nI still can't find my business meeting.\nIs this the wrong street...?

Hee hee, I'm out shopping with my daughter
again today. We can't agree on who's going to carry
the bags, so we're switching every
50 yards.

Geez, my mom's so stubborn!
I said I'd carry the bags, but she just
won't listen! But I guess I'm just as stubborn... 
I'm her daughter, after all! Ha!

Freeze! Don't move! Here it is!
I found my contact lens!
I'm so glad! What's wrong with you?
Oh, you can move now. It flew all the way over here... 
I'm so glad I kept looking for it.

What do you want?
Go away. It looks like Agent Rouge did well... 
I didn't have to do anything. Hm?
No, nothing.
Go away.
We're the Soleannan Patrol!\fWe need to arm ourselves for the upcoming\nbattle against Eggman!\fI'm a melee fighting kind of guy, so I'm going\nto use the bat my dad got me!
We're the Soleannan Patrol!\fWe must arm ourselves for the upcoming\nbattle against Eggman.\fI'm more of a ranged fighter, so I'm going to use\nthe super water rifle my mom bought me!

Hm? You want to know what I'm doing?
It's a long story, but...  Today was supposed to be the day of my first
international business trip. I've had the worst
luck, but I thought I could finally go today. But they say that something happened,
and the station is closed. The company I was going to meet with
is mad at me, and my boss says I'm fired.
What am I supposed to do now? Well, since I lost my job anyway,
maybe I'll write a book about my experiences. "How To Have the Worst Luck Ever"... 
No one's going to buy that, are they?
This is the Soleanna City Station.\nIf you see anything suspicious in the station\nor on the trains, please let us know.
This is the gate between the Castle Town and\nthe New City. I'm guarding it to make sure no\nsuspicious people pass through.
This is a warehouse.\nIf you don't have any business here, stay away.

I'm a starving artist, as you can see.
I was offered a lot of money to do a forgery
of a famous artist's painting of the sea...  But I turned it down.
I want to paint my own art, not get money for
faking someone else's. Then the guy took off his hat, and said,
"I've been looking for someone like you."
It was a world-famous painter! He agreed to take me on as his apprentice,
and he never takes apprentices!
I'm so happy, I don't know what to think! I can't believe something like this would
happen! I'm so glad I didn't give up...
Welcome.\nPlease let me know when you're ready to order.
Coo...
Such nice weather we're having.\nNothing beats a good walk when the weather's\nnice.
The owner of the shop is named Enrique.\nHe's a good guy.\nHe never gives discounts, though.
I'm the town's accordion player.\nOnce everything's over, I'll make a song\nabout your adventures.
If you go straight on here\nthere's a gate leading to the city.
I wonder what that tower is\nat the top of the hill?\nIt looks really old...

The other day, my dad says,
"Good kids who listen to Mom deserve
a nice present." So I told him! "That's a good idea, Dad. Why don't you
go get yourself a nice present?"

My daughter has started telling jokes, too.
Not only that, she's even funnier than I am. We're going to be the funniest
father-daughter comedy duo ever!
Ha, ha!
There's so much unpleasantness in the city\nand Castle Town these days. I've been coming\nout to the woods a lot more often.
